question: which among the following sentence is incorrect about Rajadhiraja Chola I?
option1: He was a born fighter son of Rajendra Chola I
option2: He died in the battle of Koppan fighting with Chalukyas
option3: He assumed the title of Parakesari
answer: He assumed the title of Parakesari
explanation:
Parakesari and Yuddhamalla were the titles of Rajendra 1
